com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log

Class LoggerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log.LoggerWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger

    public class LoggerWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger
    A class which enables to wrap a Logger, and to delegate all its interface methods to its underlying logger.

    All instances of this class are recorded, so that it is possible to configure them later on. This is especially useful, when it is required to change the implementation in the middle of an application.

    Since:
    2013.04.19
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier
    See Also:
    LoggerFactory

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoggerWrapper(java.lang.Class<?> theClass, Logger logger)
      Equivalent to using the LoggerWrapper(String, Logger) constructor, by passing theClass.getSimpleName() as second argument.
      LoggerWrapper(java.lang.String category, Logger logger)
      Creates a wrapper around the provided Logger instance.

      • configure

        public static void configure(LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator loggerConfigurator)
        Enables to configure all already created LoggerWrapper instances.
        Parameters:
        loggerConfigurator - the interface responsible for returning the Logger that will be wrapped
